about_the_game:
Workshop Wonders: Manage Your Own DIY Store and Repair Shop!

Workshop Wonders is a comprehensive first-person simulation game that invites you to manage both a DIY store and a repair shop. In this game, you will control every detail to ensure customer satisfaction and grow your business.

Game Features

  • DIY Store Management: Design your store, organize the shelves and display your products in the most efficient way. You need to place your products on shelves to sell them. Each shelf will have special compartments to display your products in an organized way. You can also order new products and expand your store from your tablet.

  • Repair Workshop: In your repair shop, fix broken items brought in by your customers. In the beginning, you'll be doing simple repairs, but in the later levels you'll be faced with more complex repairs. The repair process involves gathering the necessary materials and using the right tools to fix the items. Also, over time you can upgrade your repair tools and increase their durability.

  • Customization and Development: Customize the interior design of your shop and grow your business. You can customize the walls, windows and other building elements with various colors and combinations. You can also expand the physical space of your store and add new decoration options.

  • Employee Management: Hire employees to make your business more efficient. You can assign employees for various roles such as shelf organizers, cashiers and product checkers and improve their speed and efficiency.

  • Realistic Simulation: The game is enriched with elements such as a realistic day-night cycle, dynamic price changes and even theft. In addition, the game includes elements such as the traffic system, customer traffic and artificial intelligence characters.

  • End of Day Stats: At the end of each day, you will be presented with a detailed statistics panel that evaluates your performance. In this panel, you can see your daily earnings, the number of customers and other important data.

At Workshop Wonders, every decision matters. Can you balance customer satisfaction and financial success by transforming a modest DIY store into a massive retail chain?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 360 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k or AMD Ryzen 5 2500x
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
